name: Descension - A LDJam 42 Entry
description:
It is your time to leave the elevator, but there’s not space

Descension

Descension is a short puzzle game about leaving the elevator by pushing people and other mechanics. Will you be able to complete it?

Controls <↑> Keyboard Arrows to Move <←><↓><→> When you are next to the exit press <↑>

Game Made in 72 for #LudumDare42 by:

@CHUMASQUITO

@_jowent

Hope you like it!
